transparent;border-style:solid;border-width:8px}.header{grid-area:header;padding:10px;display:flex;justify-content:space-around;background-color:#eee}.header .lastseen{display:flex;align-self:flex-start}.header .bot-intro{display:flex;align-items:flex-start;margin-right:auto}.header .bot-intro .bot-logo{margin-right:10px;flex-grow:0;justify-content:flex-start}.header .bot-intro .bot-logo img{height:40px;width:40px;border-radius:50%}.header .bot-intro .bot-details{flex-grow:1;color:#000}.header .paperclip{display:flex;justify-self:flex-end;padding:0;position:relative;margin-top:10px;font-size:20px;margin-right:7px;color:#000}.header .paperclip a:hover{background-color:#ddd}.footer{grid-area:footer;display:flex;justify-content:center;padding:0 16px;background:#eee}.footer textarea::-webkit-scrollbar{width:5px}.footer textarea::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,.footer textarea::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:transparent}.footer textarea::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:red}.footer textarea::-webkit-scrollbar-corner{border-radius:15px 15px}.footer .icon{font-size:14px;border-radius:50%;height:32px;width:32px;display:flex;background:#2b4f70;justify-content:space-around;align-items:center;cursor:pointer;margin-top:13px;margin-left:20px;padding-right:2px;padding-bottom:2px}.footer .icon .fa{transform:rotate(45deg);transition-duration:.3s;cursor:pointer;color:#fff;display:flex;justify-content:center}.footer .icon:hover .fa{transform:rotate(0)}
